definition: lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: The pigs rooted for truffle in this forest.
sentences.chinese: 豬在森林裏用嘴拱土尋找塊菌。

sentences.english: Truffles in general are among the most expensive foods in the world.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，塊菌是世界上最昂貴的食物。

sentences.english: Truffles are a kind of mushroom that grows underground.
sentences.chinese: 塊菌是生於地面的一種菌類植物。

sentences.english: Truffle mushrooms are plentiful in the southwest Algeria desert.
sentences.chinese: 塊菌蕈類在西南部的阿爾及利亞沙漠是豐富的。

sentences.english: Ascomycetes of interest to humans include truffles yeasts and Penicillium species.
sentences.chinese: 對人類有利的子囊菌包括塊菌，酵母和產青黴素菌。

sentences.english: The truffle season in Algeria is working magic this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年，阿爾及利亞的塊菌產季簡直忙得不可思議。

sentences.english: The best way to taste a truffle is to order it from a menu.
sentences.chinese: 品嚐塊菌最好的方法是從餐廳的菜單裏點餐。
